text: Adele has canceled the remaining two dates of her massive world tour – a pair of shows this weekend at London ’ s Wembley Stadium – after damaging her vocal cords. “ To say I ’ m heartbroken would be a complete understatement, ” Adele wrote in a Twitter statement Friday. “ I ’ m already maxed out on steroids and aids for my voice. I ’ ve considered doing Saturday night ’ s show but it ’ s highly unlikely I ’ d even make it through the set and I simply can ’ t crumble in front of you all and walk out on you in that way. ” The singer ’ s 123 - date tour in support of her 2015 LP 25 was set to conclude with a four - night stand at Wembley Stadium.
